Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest

Classes for calculating files digests.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileDigester Class for computing checksums digests from files.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFileDigester Base class for implementations of FileDigester.
CRC32FileDigester Implementation of FileDigester for the CRC32 algorithm.
DigesterFactory Singleton class used to get instances of FileDigester.
MessageDigestFileDigester An implementation of FileDigester that streams the content of files to a MessageDigest.
 

Exception Summary
DigesterException Thrown when an error happens while using a FileDigester.
 

Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest Description

Classes for calculating files digests.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
DigesterFactory, FileDigester
